greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: The twice repeated nonnegative integers at even indices, the non-repeated nonnegative integers at odd indices.
formula: a(n) = A005044(n+2) - A005044(n-7). - _Johannes W. Meijer_, Oct 08 2013
a(n) = Sum_{i=1..floor(n/2)} sign((n-2i) mod 4). - _Wesley Ivan Hurt_, Apr 10 2018
a(n) = A106466(n-3) for n>=3. - _Georg Fischer_, Oct 07 2018
mathematica: Table[Sum[Sign[Mod[n - 2 i, 4]], {i, Floor[n/2]}], {n, 0, 100}] (* _Wesley Ivan Hurt_, Apr 10 2018 *)
program: (PARI) a(n) = if(n%2, n\2, n\4); \\ _Altug Alkan_, Apr 16 2018
results.author: _Paul Curtz_, Aug 16 2007
